channel.title: Release Notes on Releases - aspose.com
channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes on Releases - aspose.com

item.title: Latest release
item.description: This article contains a summary of recent changes, enhancements and bug fixes in Aspose.OCR for .NET 24.1.0 (January 2024) release. GPU version: 23.10.1 What was changed Key Summary Category OCRNET‑745 Improved text overlay positioning in searchable PDFs. Enhancement OCRNET‑758 Resolved an issue where dark areas in searchable PDF background images were incorrectly rendered in inverted colors. Fix Public API changes and backwards compatibility This section lists all public API changes introduced in Aspose.
